frontmatter.title: Why Dyslexic Narratives Matter in Tech
frontmatter.subtitle: Jeannette Washington
frontmatter.description: There has never been a better time to consider how your skills can be harnessed within the tech industry. The tech jobs of tomorrow require your narrative. After all, technology will only be as good as the people that it does the least for. Join in this month while we discuss Jeannette Washington’s new book, Technical Difficulties: Why Dyslexic Narratives Matter In Tech.

frontmatter.title: “Accessibility is too hard” - Developer Edition
frontmatter.subtitle: Panel
frontmatter.description: In this panel, we’ll dig into people’s misconceptions about the difficulty of accessibility as well as some of the ways that accessibility is genuinely difficult. Join the discussion with Aisha Blake, Kathleen McMahon, Scott O’Hara, Jared Smith, & Marcy Sutton with Caitlin Cashin as host.
